moves.name: Bite
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Vitality is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.effect: If the target attempts to switch out, this move hits before they switch and its damage is doubled.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.effect: This move has Priority, but it only works if the target is also using an attacking move.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.effect: The user raises its Special by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.effect: For 3 rounds, the target can only use attacking moves.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.effect: If the target is holding an item, it is knocked off and cannot be used for the rest of the scene. Damage is increased if an item is knocked off.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.effect: Uses the target's Strength stat instead of the user's for the damage roll.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.effect: If the target has already taken damage this turn, this move's damage is doubled.

moves.name: Comeuppance
moves.effect: Deals 1.5 times the damage the user last received.

moves.name: Darkest Lariat
moves.effect: This move ignores any changes to the target's Vitality and Evasion stats.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.effect: For 5 rounds, the target cannot use any held items.
